item.title: Michelle Williams Makes Rare Public Appearance to Fete Grand Reopening of W New York
item.description: The property unveiled its $100 million transformation to a crowd of actors, musicians and local tastemakers

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Panicking About Zohran Mamdani. NYC’s Tech Scene Is Not
item.description: New York City tech leaders aren’t rattled by the prospect of a Mayor Mamdani. In fact, many of them welcome it.
